extDesc.message: The layout of Instagram.com is not optimized for the desktop. This extension improves this.

nightModeStart_help.message: Set this and end to the same number to enable night mode permanently.

nightModeEnd_help.message: Set this and start to the same number to enable night mode permanently.

nightSystem_help.message: The Night Mode gets activated when the System is also in night mode.

rows_help.message: 1 sets the IG standard layout. Default is 4.

rowsFourBoxWidth_help.message: Only applies when the 'Posts per row' option is set to 4. Default is 23.

rowsTwoBoxWidth_help.message: Only applies when the 'Posts per row' option is set to 2. Default is 40.

watchPosts_help.message: Make sure that the Username is correct (e.g. https://instagram.com/TheUsername works)

watchStories_help.message: Make sure that the Username is correct (e.g. https://instagram.com/TheUsername works)

watchInBackground_help.message: When turned off, you're only notified when you open Instagram.com.

watch_newPost.description: Text of the Notification, when the watched User posted a new post

watch_newStory.description: Text of the Notification, when the watched User has an unseen Story

watch_newPic.description: Text of the Notification, when the watched User has a new profile picture.

hidePrivateIcon.description: Option to hide the private profile icon

hideVerifiedIcon.description: Option to hide the verified profile icon

modalWidth_help.message: Controls the width of modals (when you click a post on a user profile). Default is 85, Instagram's default around 50.
